introduction: 约瑟夫施特里克 （7月6日，1923年- 2010年6月2日） 是美国导演，制片和编剧。Born in Braddock, Pennsylvania , Strick briefly attended UCLA before enrolling in the Army during World War II .出生于宾夕法尼亚州的布拉多克， 施特里克简要出席加州大学洛杉矶分校前在招收军队在第二次世界大战期间。 In the Army, he served as a cameraman in the Army Air Forces . [ 1 ]在军队中，他曾担任陆军航空部队 的一名摄影师。[1 ]In 1948, he and Irving Lerner produced Muscle Beach . 1948年，他和欧文勒纳产生肌肉海滩 。 For several years in the 1950s, Lerner, Strick, Ben Maddow , and Sidney Meyers worked part-time on the experimental documentary The Savage Eye (1959). [ 2 ]对于在20世纪50年代的几年中，勒纳 ， 施特里克，本Maddow和悉尼迈耶斯兼职工作的实验纪录片野蛮眼（1959年 ）。[2]Strick was also a successful businessman, founding Electrosolids Corp (1956), Computron Corp. (1958), Physical Sciences Corp (1958), and Holosonics Corp. (1960) In 1977 he invented the usage of six-axis motion simulators as entertainment systems and applied it to new machines used now in Disney theme parks as "Star Tours." [ 3 ]施特里克也是一个成功的商人，Electrosolids公司（1956），Computron公司（1958年），物理科学公司（1958），和Holosonics公司（1960年）创始于1977年，他发明的六轴运动模拟器作为娱乐系统的使用并将其应用到在迪斯尼主题公园现在作为新机“星之旅”。 [3]In the 1960s, during his first marriage, Strick commissioned what would be the only house designed by Oscar Niemeyer in North America.在20世纪60年代，他的第一次婚姻期间，施特里克委托设计奥斯卡尼迈耶在北美唯一的房子会是什么。 The marriage ended in divorce before construction was completed, though, and Strick never occupied the house, located on the edge of Santa Monica Canyon . [ 1 ] [1]的婚姻以离婚收场，在施工前完成，不过，和施特里克从来没有被占领的房子，位于圣莫尼卡峡谷边缘。The Savage Eye won the BAFTA Flaherty Documentary Award , and was hailed as part of an "American New Wave" alongside the work of Shirley Clarke and John Cassavetes . [ 4 ] In 1970, He won an Academy award for best documentary for his movie Interviews with My Lai Veterans . 野蛮的眼睛赢得BAFTA弗莱厄蒂纪录片奖， 和雪莉克拉克和约翰卡萨维兹被喻为“美国新浪潮”一起工作的一部分。[ 4] 1970年，他赢得了 奥斯卡奖最佳纪录片为他的电影访谈我赖退伍军人 。 His most well-known ventures include a film adaptation of James Joyce 's Ulysses and the movie Never Cry Wolf (1983).他最知名的企业包括詹姆斯乔伊斯的“尤利西斯 “改编的电影和电影从来没有狼来了（1983 ）。In Britain he directed at the Royal Shakespeare Company (1964) and the National Theatre (2003).他冲着在英国皇家莎士比亚剧团 （1964）和国家大剧院 （2003）。Strick, who had primarily resided in Paris since the early 1970s, died in a Paris hospital of congestive heart failure .
